column1: Villa Dolores is a city in the province of Córdoba
column3: located in the southwestern side of the province. It has a population of 29

column1: Although it is one of the smallest cities in Córdoba
column2: many other provinces rely on Villa Dolores for its major export in potatoes. Wine consumption is also a large trait in this town having its own import route from the capital city of wine in Argentina

column1: Tourism in Villa Dolores peaks during the high season (January - February). Villa Dolores is known for its peaceful environment and views of the Cordoba mountain range. It is also known for its hidden rivers that run freshwater streams from the mountain tops
column2: including the stream known as "La Piedra Pintada".
